title: [Medicine] Cannabis use, even for medical purposes, could make some people sick due to harmful fungi that contaminate the plants, especially those who are immunocompromised. Some fungi may cause infection on lung and skin tissues, and these infections were most common when smoked and less common in edibles.

[Neuroscience] Neuroscientists have uncovered a key brain area in rats -the frontal and parietal cortex- that encodes the value of economic choices when faced with the economic decisions or uncertainty of a lottery. This provide a foundation for understanding the neurobiology of risky decisions
